title: 多口一問，intranet application 做唔做 SSL?

replies.msg:
假設有某啲 web service 只係俾 intranet application access
又假設 web service server 會 check IP 認到係 LAN subnet 先會放行
又假設個 VLAN subnet 係 100+ node 咁大
咁起個 web service 嘅時候，其實仲有無必要落 SSL layer?
因為公司 policy 要落，但我諗落好似幾無聊

利申 application programmer 唔係好熟 network
